Quaternion
Quaternion(
float _x,
float _y,
float _z,
float _w,
bool isvec = false
)

This ctor creates a Quaternion for a list of floats.  If 'isvec' is TRUE then _x,_y,_z form a direction vector and _w is the angle of rotation about the direction vector.  Otherwise, _x,_y,_z,_w are treated as the four components of a quaternion.

Parameters
x

X component of quaternion or X component of axis of rotation

y

Y component of quaternion or Y component of axis of rotation

z

Z component of quaternion or Z component of axis of rotation

w

W component of quaternion or angle of rotation

isvec
bool

specifies whether x/y/z/w are axis/angle or quaternion values

Quaternion &q1,

float t
)
